In a like manner the amplitude character!sties of a recording
head can be obtained* At any given frequency, record a group of
band$ each band representing a definite increase over the previous
band, say in 3 DB steps* Then by plotting the input as abscissas
and the outputs, scaled from the light bands on the record, as
ordinates, an amplitude response curve can be obtained. Any
departure from linearity indicates the presence of amplitude
distortion in the recording system.
